project.name: 2D Board Game
project.description: A 2D board game where players take turns adding gems. If the number of gems in a square matches its neighbors, gems overflow and change to the player's color. The game ends when all gems are the same color, determining the winner.

project.name: Order Management System
project.description: Improved the flow from customer orders to fulfillment by organizing tasks, balancing workloads, tracking orders, and managing inventory. Used C++ debugging tools and tests to fix issues with task coordination, order tracking, and inventory management.

project.name: Secure-Blog-Platform
project.description: Developed a secure blog platform that integrates GitHub OAuth for user authentication. Users can log in via GitHub, create, edit, and manage their blog posts. The system automatically refreshes blog content at regular intervals to display the latest updates. It also efficiently handles errors and ensures secure data storage and persistence.

education.name: Seneca College
education.description: Engaged in practical and theoretical learning in system programming, and data handling.
